beans: user dumps a can of cold beans on targets head
cakebomb: user throws a cake bomb. KABOOM. now everyones covered in frosting. duck or grab a spoon
chocolate: user pours melted chocolate all over target
pie: user splats a large raspberry cream pie into targets face, yum
sundae: user pushes target into an enormous ice cream sundae, quick eat your way out
Puppies: user releases a pack of adorable puppies on target, enjoy the puppy kisses
kittens: user is surrounded by cute kittens, enjoy the floofs
tea: user is heading to brew some tea, anyone else want one?
coffee: user is off to make a coffee, who wants one?
foodfight: user has declared a food fight, get your sporks ready
cannon: user fires spuds at target with their potato cannon
fishstick: user buries target under a metric ton of fishsticks
toast: user flings a piece of buttered toast target, hitting in the face
dodge: user dodges the flying food like a pro! Aim better next time!
block: user raises a tower shield to block the incoming food
sprinkles: user covers target in a wide variety of sprinkles
jam: user slathers target in strawberry jam
cucumber: user wacks target on the head with a cucumber
spaghetti: user dumps spaghetti and meatballs on top of target
batter: user dumps a bucket of pancake batter on targets head
cheese: user smacks target in the face with a slice of cheese
broccoli: user throws cooked broccoli florets at target
socks: user makes target wear soggy socks yuck!
gloves: user forces target to wear soggy gloves
donut: user throws a donut at target like a shuriken
